meanings.definition: The act of stretching or pulling something with a rubber material.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the rubbering of the elastic band, watching it stretch.
meanings.sent2: The rubbering of the balloon made it expand slowly.
meanings.sent3: The rubbering of the rubber band made it look like a mini slingshot.
meanings.sent4: His rubbering of the eraser showed how flexible it was.
meanings.sent5: The rubbering of the rubber sheet demonstrated its elasticity.

meanings.definition: The act of erasing pencil marks with a rubber eraser.
meanings.sent1: He used gentle rubbering to remove the pencil marks from the paper.
meanings.sent2: The rubbering of the eraser left a clean surface behind.
meanings.sent3: The rubbering of the eraser made the marks disappear like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her careful rubbering of the paper revealed a pristine sheet.
meanings.sent5: The thorough rubbering of the eraser removed all traces of the pencil marks.
